name: Amped 3
description: Amped® 3 Recipe for Fun: Take the best snowboarding physics, controls, and tricks…top with zesty sled crashing and go-anywhere snowmobiles…add a pinch of powder carving…season with insanely hilarious story…mix with 230 new challenges and pour into huge playground snowboxes…spread evenly over seven massive resorts. Play it. Eat it. Love it.
